Vendor: yuki
Type: LINT FREE - FLOCKED APPLICATORS

These Lint-Free Applicators are an ideal alternative to traditional cotton swabs, which contain fibers that can easily get caught between natural eyelashes and eyelash extensions. Recommended for use with Lash Shampoo.

entry.title: Volume Glue Ring
entry.summary:
Vendor: alibaba
Type: glue ring
Price: 9.99

We LOVE making our own volume fans from lashes as thin as .03 mm! How do people do it? Easy Fans don't require training and can help you self-learn the proper techniques. Silk Volume lashes are what the professionals choose because the lashes will wrap around the natural lash and thus increase retention.  

Using this simple glue ring, you will have more control over keeping the base together and making that perfect, thin base volume fan. 

How to use:

1) Choose where you want to place the ring: either on your finger or use a sticky dot to affix it to a hard surface

2) Use 2-3 drops of adhesive into one side of the ring

3) Make your best volume fan with your favourite method

4) Dip the base into a tiny amount of adhesive

5) Drag the base through the cutouts on the ring to perfect the base. Use micromovements to reduce the grip of the tweezers to help fluff out that fan!

6) Apply onto one natural lash at a time

entry.title: Mina Thread
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mina
Type: Brow Thread
Price: 9.00

Mina Thread is used to remove excess brow hair from the area and unwanted facial hair. It is made of cotton, grown and harvested without the use of any pesticides, herbicides, insecticides, chemical fertilizers or any other chemicals, on land that has been chemically free for at least 3 years. This ensures the production of cotton that is not only environment friendly but is skin-friendly also, making it suitable for use on the most sensitive skin types.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Mina Thread is intended for professional use and for this reason the professional use and for this reason, the professional using this product must be familiar with at least one facial hair removal technique. Prior to use, it is necessary to wash the hands and facial area using Mina Henna.

Net Qty.: 300meter

entry.title: Mina White Brow Paste and Barrier
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mina
Type:
Price: 13.30

Mina White Brow Paste is the secret professional brow artists use to get picture-perfect eyebrows with a defined shape and the desired look. Outline the brows with this thick white paste, or sketch the right shape of the eyebrows visible to you & the client that helps to perfect your brow tinting.

The paste also assists to avoid stains and smudges on the skin.

Application Accessories:

Angled Brow Brush - use a flat edge to create a barrier around the precise area you want to work with. Remove after with cotton rounds

Threading Thread - place a small amount of paste onto a flat sterile surface and roll threading thread in the paste. Use the thread to make temporary guidelines for microblading, permanent makeup, or henna treatments

INGREDIENTS: Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclomethicone, Stearyl Dimethicone, Silica Tocopheryl acetate, Carnauba wax, Beeswax, May Contain: Titanium dioxide CI 77891

Net Qty.: 5g

Online Instructions: https://www.ibrowhenna.com/pages/how-to-use

entry.title: Mulberry 100% Silk Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lashes By Design
Type: Face Mask
Price: 9.99

Treat yourself to luxurious 100% silk on your face. Prevents breakout and rashes on your skin. 

Adjustable earloop strap to make the perfect snug and comfortable fit.

  • Made from 100% Mulberry Silk: Silk allows your skin to simply glide over the surface of the smooth fabric, where cotton can be more abrasive. This prevents acne and breakouts.
  • Machine Washable: Hand or machine wash cold delicate using a gentle detergent. Hang dry or tumble dry low, for 10 minutes.
  • Adjustable Ear Loop and Nose Clip: Mask can be adjusted to tailor to each individual face.
  • Filter Pocket (Filter Included): Mask can be fitted with loose filter material, including any kind of HEPA filter, which may improve effectiveness.
  • Hypoallergenic and Breathable: Very breathable and cool during the summer months. This mask provides a great combo of fashion and function.

Black is the most popular colour so grab them while they are still available!
